MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00am to replace a damaged electricity pole and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:35am on Thursday, 19 November 2020
